Reviews.Title: it was good
Reviews.Author: das
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived on time with all the proper mentioned parts. However the pack contains no adapter to attach the macro and telephoto lens to the camera

ProductInfo.Features:
Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera w/ EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 II IS Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Canon EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens Brand New USA w/Manufacturer's Supplied Accessories
Rechargeable LPE8 Lithium Ion Replacement Battery + External Rapid Quick-Charger with Car Adapater
16GB SDHC Class 10 Secure Digital Memory Card + External Digital Slave SLR Flash
0.45x Wide Angle Lens w/ Carry Pouch and Caps + 2X Telephoto Lens w/ Carry Pounch and Caps
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3i 18 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens & EF-S 55-250mm f/4.0-5.6 IS Telephoto Zoom Lens + Wide Angle/Telephoto 16GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
